channel.title: Authors on Stranger Society
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Stranger Society

item.title: Stranger Society
item.description: What is Stranger Society? It’s a journey of introspection, embracing one of the oldest spirits in making sense of the world, internal and external, and communicating it with fellow beings; The spirit of storytelling. It’s a community for those who choose, willingly, to embrace the stranger’s voice that’s within all of us. The voice that questions and shakes the whole foundation of our existence, beliefs and faith. The voice that intensifies in our solitude, feeding on our depression, anger and pain.
